Chuffed to get the chance to talk about Youth development @WLClarion at the @ScottishCycling Sharing best practice session today.
@nsoamesmp Good for you. Those electric bikes are great
@Fraser_J_ @WLClarion @AlecBalll @GordonReid91 @CallumSkinner Thanks for being such great role models, he had a blast.
Astonishing. @HumzaYousaf actually manages to reduce cycle use. https://t.co/V7MyKyMlJQ
Good luck to the 2nd leggers on #CycleGB2016. Hope you enjoy it as much as the 1st ledgers did @BenendenUK @SAMHtweets @ThinkPublishing
#CycleGB2016. 1st leg complete. Well done everyone, what a team! @BenendenUK @ThinkPublishing @SAMHtweets https://t.co/XBREgX6pps
#CycleGB2016. flat roads at last! Last few miles to the finish @BenendenUK @SAMHtweets @ThinkPublishing https://t.co/uaed5xS7L4

Day 1 #cycleUK2016: hills, sun, head wind, rain & cake but we made it! @SAMHtweets @BenendenUK @ThinkPublishing https://t.co/58HytDeP8i
Kit fits, legs shaved, I'm ready for #cycleGB2016 with @BenendenUK @SAMHtweets proud to represent @ThinkPublishing https://t.co/BInkeYKEXp

@MrMarkBeaumont Could you share Alex's (age 14) petition please? Scotland needs a traffic-free bike track! https://t.co/wPJrN5rrX2
@CraigHardie @POPScotland no contact Craig but riders didn't know what driver was doing
@CraigHardie @POPScotland a car turned out on a group of youths, drove wrong side of road alongside then sped off leaving chaos in wake
@NiceWeeCod @POPScotland The track will also be used for coaching youths & adults beginners and returners to build confidence
@POPScotland I Agree and thanks for sharing

@ScotRail Thanks for the quick response, train was much better today! https://t.co/enDtOedlD7
@ScotRail thanks for responding. What will you do to improve the service? Week on week it gets more overcrowded. Difficult to get off train
@ScotRail the 8.02am Caldercruix to Glasgow is so overcrowded people can't get on. It gets worse each week https://t.co/7BZxLl056g

@bbc5live Nearly 40% of athletes on the @ukantidoping banned list are from Rugby Union. Why no coverage about @rugbyworldcup drug abuse?
@spikeyhelen argh!
@spikeyhelen thought of you when we saw this cliff face in Ribiere gorge. Have you climbed it? http://t.co/RQMDDPCBc0
@spikeyhelen @SkyNewsBreak no avoiding all media before I watch it! Now I'm intrigued!
